analyzed: phyag na rdo rje'i las bsgrub pa'i thabs bzhugs so//_@##/_/rgya gar

analyzed: tra la rten pa ma yin gsung /_de ltar yin par kyang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung las rnyed pa'i bya'i tshhig des gsal gsung ngo /_/

analyzed: bar byed cing 'phrin las kyis/_/gnod ldan sems can smin mdzad pa'i/_/gdug pa

analyzed: ma lus tshhar gcod cing /_/'gro don drag pos 'gro ba gdug pa can gyi don la brtshon zhing zhi bas snod

analyzed: rje 'dzin pa'i lung las su/_/rnyed pa'i phyir bzlog rim pa bri/_/
translated: reverse sequence is written.🔽There are three topics: the reverse sequence of🔽harmful, evil, and reversal. The reverse sequence of the

analyzed: ma rungs pa dang gnod pa dang bzlog pa'i rim pa gsum nyid de/_/lus kyi sbyor ba ngag gi sbyor

analyzed: dang mu stegs nang pas 'jig rten pa brten pa'i nus pas 'tshhe ba thams cad kyi gnod pa bzlog par bya'o snyam pa'o/_/blo
translated: who rely on worldly [deities].”🔽 Generate the excellent mind of enlightenment.🔽Facing east, on birch bark or cloth,

analyzed: bzangs bskyed/_/shar phyogs kha bltas gro ga 'am/_/ras kyis shing shun dri

analyzed: yis byung /_/nya phyis snod du bdug pas bdug_/tshan dan gla rtshi gur kum

analyzed: gyis/_/'khor lo rtshibs drug bri bar bya/_/de yi phyi rim mu khyud bskor/_/
translated: Around that, make a surrounding ring.🔽On the outer wheel with eight spokes,

original: phyi rim 'khor lo rtshibs brgyad la/_/mu khyud kyis ni bskor bar bya/_/om badzra
analyzed: phyi rim 'khor lo rtshibs brgyad la/_/mu khyud kyis ni bskor bar bya/_/om badzra
translated: make a surrounding ring.🔽Om vajrapani hum phat.

analyzed: pa ni hum phat/_ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid phyag na rdo rjes dbang du bsdus la sgyel om badzra pa ni bdag ma ma
translated: Having been brought under the power of Vajrapani, the embodiment of the five wisdoms,

analyzed: rak+sha rak+sha hu~m hu~m phat phat che ge mo bsrungs shig gnyis swa ha/_sdang ba thams cad sarba dush+tan bgegs
translated: Rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ hūṃ phaṭ phaṭ, protect such-and-such.🔽All enemies, all obstructors,🔽kill, kill mara ya, kill, kill mara ya hūṃ phaṭ.

original: thams cad sarba big+ha nam/_sod cig ma ra ya sod cig ma ra ya hum phat/_sarba dush+ta sarba
analyzed: thams cad sarba big+ha nam/_sod cig ma ra ya sod cig ma ra ya hum phat/_sarba dush+ta sarba
translated: All enemies, all obstructors,🔽crush, crush hūṃ phaṭ.

original: big+ha nam/_ha na ha na hum phat/_sarba dush+ta sarba big+ha nam da ha da ha hum phat/🔽sarba dush+ta sarba big+ha nam pa tsha pa tsha hum phat/_sarba dush+ta sarba big+ha nam a ka ra sha ya
analyzed: big+ha nam/_ha na ha na hum phat/_sarba dush+ta sarba big+ha nam da ha da ha hum phat/ sarba dush+ta sarba big+ha nam pa tsha pa tsha hum phat/_sarba dush+ta sarba big+ha nam a ka ra sha ya
translated: All enemies, all obstructors, burn, burn hūṃ phaṭ.🔽All enemies, all obstructors, split, split hūṃ phaṭ.🔽All enemies, all obstructors, paralyze, paralyze hūṃ phaṭ.

original: a ka ra sha ya hum phat/_sarba dush+ta sarba big+ha nam bi da ra bi da ra hum phat/_sarba
analyzed: a ka ra sha ya hum phat/_sarba dush+ta sarba big+ha nam bi da ra bi da ra hum phat/_sarba
translated: All enemies, all obstructors, destroy, destroy hūṃ phaṭ.🔽All enemies, all obstructors, crush, crush hūṃ phaṭ.

original: dush+ta sarba big+ha nam tshhin d+ha tshhin d+ha hum phat/_sarba dush+ta sarba big+ha nam a pra ha ta hu~m
analyzed: dush+ta sarba big+ha nam tshhin d+ha tshhin d+ha hum phat/_sarba dush+ta sarba big+ha nam a pra ha ta hu~m
translated: All enemies, all obstructors, are invincible hūṃ phaṭ.

original: phat/_drug pa yi ge nang gi rtshibs dang bcu drug pa yi ge mu khyud dang /_/rtshibs brgyad po
analyzed: phat/_drug pa yi ge nang gi rtshibs dang bcu drug pa yi ge mu khyud dang /_/rtshibs brgyad po
translated: The sixth is the inner spokes, the sixteenth is the outer ring, and the eight spokes.

original: rkang pa brgyad po la sngags rnams dgod/_/sngags kyi rkang pa brgyad po la/_/rdo🔽rje o~m badzra pa ni zhes pa'i 'dzin pa klad du sbyar/_/gzungs rings gsang sngags kun gyi gtsho
analyzed: rkang pa brgyad po la sngags rnams dgod/_/sngags kyi rkang pa brgyad po la/_/rdo rje o~m badzra pa ni zhes pa'i 'dzin pa klad du sbyar/_/gzungs rings gsang sngags kun gyi gtsho
translated: On the eight spokes of the mantra,🔽the vajra, oṃ, and vajrapāṇi are connected to the beginning.🔽The essence mantra of all secret mantras🔽is written inside the outer ring:

original: bo ni/_/mu khyud phyi ma'i nang du bri/_/mo badzra pa ni che ge mo la rak+sha rak+sha hum zhes pa'o/_/lte bar
analyzed: bo ni/_/mu khyud phyi ma'i nang du bri/_/mo badzra pa ni che ge mo la rak+sha rak+sha hum zhes pa'o/_/lte bar
translated: “Oṃ vajrapāṇi, protect so-and-so, rakṣa rakṣa hūṃ.”🔽The name of the person who wears it🔽and the final support are written in the center.

original: 'chang ba'i skyes bu yi/_/ming dang mtha' rten bri bar bya/_/de ltar 'khor lo
analyzed: 'chang ba'i skyes bu yi/_/ming dang mtha' rten bri bar bya/_/de ltar 'khor lo
translated: In that way, the wheel🔽is complete.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rje'i las pa'i pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rje'i las pa'i pa'i thabs zhes bya ba
translated: The Method Called “The Activity of Vajrapāṇi, the Vajra Holder”🔽is complete.

original: rdzogs pa dang /_/ma 'dal steng du legs bzhag ste/_/mchod pa'i tshhogs kyis
analyzed: rdzogs pa dang /_/ma 'dal steng du legs bzhag ste/_/mchod pa'i tshhogs kyis
translated: Place it well on top of the maṇḍala,🔽make offerings with a collection of offerings,

original: mchod byas la/_/rab gnas man ngag gi byas la rang gi lus la bcang bar bya/_/nye bar
analyzed: mchod byas la/_/rab gnas man ngag gi byas la rang gi lus la bcang bar bya/_/nye bar
translated: perform the consecration, and keep it on one’s body.🔽It protects from all harm.

original: 'tshhe ba kun las bsrung /_/bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: 'tshhe ba kun las bsrung /_/bsrung ba'i 'khor lo rdzogs so//_//
translated: The protection wheel is complete.

original: de nas bzlog pa'i 'khor lo ni/_/dbang phyug gi rten du btshugs pa gsum lha yi rgyal
analyzed: de nas bzlog pa'i 'khor lo ni/_/dbang phyug gi rten du btshugs pa gsum lha yi rgyal
translated: which is drawn on a cloth of the king of gods,

original: mtshhan sngon po 'am/_/dur khrod ras la bsrung ba yi/_/'khor lo'i dbyibs
analyzed: mtshhan sngon po 'am/_/dur khrod ras la bsrung ba yi/_/'khor lo'i dbyibs
translated: a blue cloth, or a cloth from a charnel ground.

original: mthun 'khor lo bri/_/nang gi rtshibs la snying po ste/_/rtshibs par rnams su
analyzed: mthun 'khor lo bri/_/nang gi rtshibs la snying po ste/_/rtshibs par rnams su
translated: In the center of the wheel,🔽draw the mantra: Oṃ hūṃ mara ya phaṭ.

original: sngags 'di bri/_/om hum ma ra ya phat/_de yi phyi rim mu khyud la/_/rdo rje sngon
analyzed: sngags 'di bri/_/om hum ma ra ya phat/_de yi phyi rim mu khyud la/_/rdo rje sngon
translated: Around that, on the outer rim,🔽is a blue vajra with five prongs,

original: po rtshe lnga pa'i/_/lte bar hum brgyad bris pas bskor/_/de yi phyi rim rtshibs
analyzed: po rtshe lnga pa'i/_/lte bar hum brgyad bris pas bskor/_/de yi phyi rim rtshibs
translated: surrounded by eight hūṃs written in the center.🔽On the eight spokes

original: brgyad la/_/sngags dgod bsrung ba'i sngags dang mthun/_/gsang sngags rgyal
analyzed: brgyad la/_/sngags dgod bsrung ba'i sngags dang mthun/_/gsang sngags rgyal
translated: outside of that, arrange the mantras in accordance with the protection mantra.🔽The king of secret mantras surrounds the rim.🔽Smear the wheel with foul-smelling substances such as poison, blood, and gugul.

original: pos mu khyud bskor/_/'khor lo dang dug dang khrag dang gu gul la sogs pa dri mi zhim pas byug la
analyzed: pos mu khyud bskor/_/'khor lo dang dug dang khrag dang gu gul la sogs pa dri mi zhim pas byug la
translated: Smear it with poisonous liquid.

original: dug gi khu bas byug_/tshakra gnyis byed pa la zer nyi zla'i bar du bsgrub bya gzhug_/nag
analyzed: dug gi khu bas byug_/tshakra gnyis byed pa la zer nyi zla'i bar du bsgrub bya gzhug_/nag
translated: For those who make two cakras, place the victim between the sun and moon.

original: po'i dus nas bzung nas su/_/gsang sngags bzlos pa'i sbyor ba ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pas
analyzed: po'i dus nas bzung nas su/_/gsang sngags bzlos pa'i sbyor ba ting nge 'dzin dang bcas pas
translated: one should recite the secret mantra together with the meditative concentration of the application.

original: tshhes drug bar du bla ma'i man ngag gis de'i ting nge 'dzin dang gdam ngag bla ma'i zhal las lta'o gsungs
analyzed: tshhes drug bar du bla ma'i man ngag gis de'i ting nge 'dzin dang gdam ngag bla ma'i zhal las lta'o gsungs
translated: Up to the sixth month, one should look at the meditative concentration and instructions of that [wheel] from the guru’s mouth.

original: 'khor lo bskor/_/rang tshakra bskor dus su rang nyid lha'i bsam pa brtan byas te/_/mu
analyzed: 'khor lo bskor/_/rang tshakra bskor dus su rang nyid lha'i bsam pa brtan byas te/_/mu
translated: When turning the wheel, one should stabilize the thought of oneself as the deity, and

original: khyud phyi ma'i sngags rnam la/_/rtshibs brgyad gsang sngags btags te bzlas/_/
analyzed: khyud phyi ma'i sngags rnam la/_/rtshibs brgyad gsang sngags btags te bzlas/_/
translated: one should recite the mantra of the outer rim, adding the secret mantra to the eight spokes.🔽If the signs of wrathful activity are complete, one should stop.

original: drag po'i las rtags rdzogs na bzhag_/rtags rnams med par gyur pa na/_/
analyzed: drag po'i las rtags rdzogs na bzhag_/rtags rnams med par gyur pa na/_/
translated: When the signs are gone,

original: tshhes bdun nas ni dgu yi bar/_/thun dang dgu'i nub mo phur pa'i sbyor ba bdun brgyad
analyzed: tshhes bdun nas ni dgu yi bar/_/thun dang dgu'i nub mo phur pa'i sbyor ba bdun brgyad
translated: from the seventh to the ninth month, one should perform the application of the kīla seven or eight times🔽in the evening of the ninth of the waning fortnight.

original: kyi nub mo bya/_/bzlog pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: kyi nub mo bya/_/bzlog pa'i 'khor lo rdzogs so//_//
translated: The wheel of averting is complete.

original: spyir gnod 'tshhams chung ba la sngags kyi cho ga gsung 'bring na sngags dang ting nge 'dzin/_gnyis tsham yan dang che
analyzed: spyir gnod 'tshhams chung ba la sngags kyi cho ga gsung 'bring na sngags dang ting nge 'dzin/_gnyis tsham yan dang che
translated: In general, for minor harm, there is the mantra ritual; for medium, mantra and meditative concentration; for great, mantra, meditative concentration, and ritual action; and for very great, mantra, meditative concentration, ritual action, and wrathful activity.

original: na sngags dang ting nge 'dzin dang 'khor lo'i sbyor ba gsum ka dgos gsung /_da res 'dir kyang sngags kho nas chog pa la
analyzed: na sngags dang ting nge 'dzin dang 'khor lo'i sbyor ba gsum ka dgos gsung /_da res 'dir kyang sngags kho nas chog pa la
translated: Here, it is sufficient to do just the mantra.

original: sngags kyi rim pa gnyis nyid de/_/bzlas pa'i sngags dang bzlas pa'i thabs/_/
analyzed: sngags kyi rim pa gnyis nyid de/_/bzlas pa'i sngags dang bzlas pa'i thabs/_/
translated: The mantra has two stages: the mantra of recitation and the method of recitation.

original: bzlas pa'i gsang sngags gnyis nyid de/_/bsrung ba'i sngags dang bsad pa'i
analyzed: bzlas pa'i gsang sngags gnyis nyid de/_/bsrung ba'i sngags dang bsad pa'i
translated: The mantra of recitation has two: the mantra of protection and the method of killing.

original: thabs/_/mu khyud phyi ma'i gsang sngags la/_/mu khyud nang ma'i gsang sngags
analyzed: thabs/_/mu khyud phyi ma'i gsang sngags la/_/mu khyud nang ma'i gsang sngags
translated: The mantra of the outer rim is applied to the mantra of the inner rim,

original: btags/_/brgya phrag bcu gsum bzlas par bya/_/de ltar bsrung ba them pa
analyzed: btags/_/brgya phrag bcu gsum bzlas par bya/_/de ltar bsrung ba them pa
translated: and one should recite it thirteen hundred times.🔽In that way, the protection is applied to the outer rim,

original: dang /_/mu khyud phyi ma'i gsang sngags la/_/rtshibs brgyad 'khor lo'i gsang
analyzed: dang /_/mu khyud phyi ma'i gsang sngags la/_/rtshibs brgyad 'khor lo'i gsang
translated: and the mantra of the wheel with eight spokes is applied to the mantra of the outer rim.🔽Recite it until the signs are complete.

original: sngags btags/_/mtshhan ma ma rdzogs bar du bzlas/_/de ni sngags kyi rim
analyzed: sngags btags/_/mtshhan ma ma rdzogs bar du bzlas/_/de ni sngags kyi rim
translated: That is the stage of the mantra.

original: pa'o/_/sngags kyi rim pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: pa'o/_/sngags kyi rim pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: The stage of the mantra is complete.

original: ting nge 'dzin kyang gnyis nyid de/_/bsrung dang bsad pa'i bdag nyid do//
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin kyang gnyis nyid de/_/bsrung dang bsad pa'i bdag nyid do//
translated: Samadhi also has two: the nature of protection and killing.

original: de la bsrung ba'i ting 'dzin ni/_/rang nyid phyag na rdo rjer bskyed/_/snying
analyzed: de la bsrung ba'i ting 'dzin ni/_/rang nyid phyag na rdo rjer bskyed/_/snying
translated: The meditative absorption of protection is as follows:🔽Generate yourself as Vajrapāṇi,🔽and at the heart center imagine a seed syllable and a vajra.

original: gar sa bon rdo rje bsam/_/'od 'phros rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/_/thugs kar
analyzed: gar sa bon rdo rje bsam/_/'od 'phros rdo rje 'dzin pa yi/_/thugs kar
translated: Light radiates and enters the heart center of Vajradhara,🔽who melts into light and dissolves into your body.

original: zhugs te 'od du 'gyur/_/rang gi lus la thim par bsam/_/rdo rje 'dzin
analyzed: zhugs te 'od du 'gyur/_/rang gi lus la thim par bsam/_/rdo rje 'dzin
translated: You become equal in strength to Vajradhara

original: pa'i stobs snyed de/_/bgegs kyi tshhogs rnams 'joms par bsam/_/
analyzed: pa'i stobs snyed de/_/bgegs kyi tshhogs rnams 'joms par bsam/_/
translated: and imagine that the hordes of obstructors are destroyed.🔽Next, the meditative absorption of killing is as follows:

original: de nas bsad pa'i ting 'dzin ni/_/rang nyid phyag na rdo rjer bsam/_/
analyzed: de nas bsad pa'i ting 'dzin ni/_/rang nyid phyag na rdo rjer bsam/_/
translated: Imagine yourself as Vajrapāṇi.

original: snying gar sa bon rdo rje las/_/'od 'phros rdo rje'i gur dang ni/_/ra bas sa
analyzed: snying gar sa bon rdo rje las/_/'od 'phros rdo rje'i gur dang ni/_/ra bas sa
translated: Light radiates from the seed syllable and vajra at the heart center,🔽and imagine that the place becomes a vajra tent🔽and a vajra fence.

original: gzhir gyur par bsam/_/de nas 'od 'phros 'od zer las/_/byung ba'i phyag
analyzed: gzhir gyur par bsam/_/de nas 'od 'phros 'od zer las/_/byung ba'i phyag
translated: Then light radiates and from the light rays🔽imagine a multitude of Vajrapāṇis appear,🔽some holding iron hooks and some holding vajras.🔽Imagine that they summon and beat all the harmful enemies and obstructors🔽from the depths of their hearts.

original: na rdo rje'i tshhogs/_/phyag na lcags kyu rdo rje 'dzin/_/gnod byed dgra dang bgegs kun gyi/_/snying nas bkug cing brdung bar bsam/_/hum zhes pa dang sngags
analyzed: na rdo rje'i tshhogs/_/phyag na lcags kyu rdo rje 'dzin/_/gnod byed dgra dang bgegs kun gyi/_/snying nas bkug cing brdung bar bsam/_/hum zhes pa dang sngags
translated: Recite “hum” and the mantra

original: bzlas pa la sogs pa dang phyag mtshhan la sogs pa las 'di 'phros pa las 'od zer rab tu tshha bas bsreg pa
analyzed: bzlas pa la sogs pa dang phyag mtshhan la sogs pa las 'di 'phros pa las 'od zer rab tu tshha bas bsreg pa
translated: From the recitation and so forth and the hand implements and so forth, light rays radiate from this, burning with fire.

original: rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rje'i las bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/
analyzed: rdo rje 'dzin pa phyag na rdo rje'i las bsgrub pa'i thabs zhes bya ba/
translated: The Means of Accomplishment of the Activity of Vajrapāṇi, the Vajra Holder, called “The Means of Accomplishment”

original: dang /_/mtshhon cha'i sbyor ba'i btub pa dang /_/drag po'i stobs kyis bcom
analyzed: dang /_/mtshhon cha'i sbyor ba'i btub pa dang /_/drag po'i stobs kyis bcom
translated: and the ability of the weapon, and imagine that they are destroyed by the power of wrath.

original: par bsam/_/thun mtshhams bsrung ba'i ting 'dzin bya/_/bgegs kyi gnod🔽pa zhi bar 'gyur/_/dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i las rim ni/_/'jig rten pa brten
analyzed: par bsam/_/thun mtshhams bsrung ba'i ting 'dzin bya/_/bgegs kyi gnod pa zhi bar 'gyur/_/dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i las rim ni/_/'jig rten pa brten
translated: In between sessions, do the meditative absorption of protection.🔽The harm of obstructors will be pacified.🔽The sequence of activities of the glorious Vajra Holder is the instruction for pacifying all the harms of sentient beings

original: pa'i nus mthus sems can nye bar 'tshhe ba ma lus pa zhi bar byed pa'i gdams pa/_/bdag gis
analyzed: pa'i nus mthus sems can nye bar 'tshhe ba ma lus pa zhi bar byed pa'i gdams pa/_/bdag gis
translated: through the power of worldly reliance.🔽By whatever virtue I have accumulated🔽from arranging this of master Virūpa,

original: slob dpon bir+ya da bkod las dge ba gang bsags des/_/'gro kun nyer 'tshhe'i gnod
analyzed: slob dpon bir+ya da bkod las dge ba gang bsags des/_/'gro kun nyer 'tshhe'i gnod
translated: may all beings be free from the harm of harm.

original: pa dang bral shog_/dpal phyag na rdo rje'i las bsgrub pa'i thabs/_rnal
analyzed: pa dang bral shog_/dpal phyag na rdo rje'i las bsgrub pa'i thabs/_rnal
translated: The Means of Accomplishing the Activity of Glorious Vajrapāṇi,

original: 'byor pa sgyir ya shris mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
analyzed: 'byor pa sgyir ya shris mdzad pa rdzogs so//_//
translated: composed by the yogin Śrīśūra, is complete.

original: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pan+di ta d+hi pam ka ra shri dz+nya na dang /_lotsh+tshha ba dge slong
analyzed: rgya gar gyi mkhan po pan+di ta d+hi pam ka ra shri dz+nya na dang /_lotsh+tshha ba dge slong
translated: monk

original: rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/_/
analyzed: rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus pa'o/_/
translated: Lotsawa Rinchen Zangpo translated and revised it.

original: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i las rim 'di/_/rdo rje'i mtshhan ldan bla ma'i
analyzed: dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa'i las rim 'di/_/rdo rje'i mtshhan ldan bla ma'i
translated: This ritual of the glorious Vajra Holder🔽was requested by me, Josay Jode,

original: zhal snga nas/_/jo sras don grub zhes bya ba bdag gis ni/_/gzhan la phan
analyzed: zhal snga nas/_/jo sras don grub zhes bya ba bdag gis ni/_/gzhan la phan
translated: with the wish to benefit others.

original: 'dod sems kyis zhus pa'o/_/de la shes rab bsod nams bdag gis zhus/_/
analyzed: 'dod sems kyis zhus pa'o/_/de la shes rab bsod nams bdag gis zhus/_/
translated: It was requested by Sherab Sonam,🔽and the master Jangtangpa included it in his mind

original: slob dpon byang thang pa'i zhabs par zhus slob dpon gzer bas/_man ngag dang bcas sems kyi khongs su chud/_/
analyzed: slob dpon byang thang pa'i zhabs par zhus slob dpon gzer bas/_man ngag dang bcas sems kyi khongs su chud/_/
translated: along with the instructions.🔽It is not like the instructions of those who say,

original: gzhan gyi gzhung 'byang btshal nas shes zer ba'i/_/man ngag med pa rnams dang 'dra ba min/
analyzed: gzhan gyi gzhung 'byang btshal nas shes zer ba'i/_/man ngag med pa rnams dang 'dra ba min/
translated: “I know it from studying other texts.”
